title: Sai Sagar Pure Veg
description: Large menu with lots of vegan options. Buffet is 50rmb and has a few vegan options as well. Be sure to explain no paneer, no yoghurt, no milk, etc. Indian staff speaks English. Free Wi-fi. Located on the 3rd floor of Gitic Commercial Center.
streetAddress: Huangtian Zhi Jie, Lujing Road, Yue Xiu District
